379c162aac12eca2deca690287b54ad270cc2e40.name: Chet Haase
379c162aac12eca2deca690287b54ad270cc2e40.bio: Chet leads the Android Toolkit, working on animations, graphics, UI, performance, and anything else that puts the pixels on the screen. And sometimes, just sometimes, he takes a break from comedy to give a technical talk.

4a7ca4c16cbe81a612bf3011a3d3439f85408103.shortBio: Romain works on 3D real-time graphics and Kotlin on the Android team at Google. He previously managed the UI toolkit team and the graphics team...
4a7ca4c16cbe81a612bf3011a3d3439f85408103.name: Romain Guy
4a7ca4c16cbe81a612bf3011a3d3439f85408103.bio: Romain works on 3D real-time graphics and Kotlin on the Android team at Google. He previously managed the UI toolkit team and the graphics team.

a14457ee24a86a604c55d6774bed5483b630e78f.name: Eyal LEZMY
a14457ee24a86a604c55d6774bed5483b630e78f.bio:
- Treasurer at the Paris Android User Group
- Co-organizer of Android Makers in Paris
- Google Developer Expert Android and IoT

I’ve been working with Android since 2009. I took part of several R&D projects at french internet providers, then at Samsung in the Android B2B team, I also built an Android set-top box for a hotel chain, and I finally worked several years on Genymotion, an Android emulator. Then I joined Qonto a bank for freelancers, startups and SMBs.
a14457ee24a86a604c55d6774bed5483b630e78f.shortBio:

- Co-organizer of Android Makers in Paris
- Google Developer Expert Android and IoT...

289e5c0e7494a73fc56ebc509dfe5aa9a1d564c2.name: Florina Muntenescu
289e5c0e7494a73fc56ebc509dfe5aa9a1d564c2.bio: Florina is working as an Android Developer Advocate at Google, helping developers architect clean, testable apps using the Architecture Components libraries and Kotlin. She has been working with Android for 8 years, previous work covering news at upday, payment solutions at payleven and navigation services at Garmin.
289e5c0e7494a73fc56ebc509dfe5aa9a1d564c2.shortBio: Florina is working as an Android Developer Advocate at Google, helping developers architect clean, testable apps using the Architecture Comp...

cac5b6bc1f05caa67061c64989f324a517735a29.name: Benjamin Monjoie
cac5b6bc1f05caa67061c64989f324a517735a29.bio: Developer since 2004, Benjamin has grown fond of Android since he started tinkering with it in 2011. He was previously employed at Emakina as lead Android developer. Since July 2016, he started his career as a freelancer. Through his work, he does his best to share his passion for the platform and ensure Android applications are not copied/pasted from their iOS counterpart. He stays closely up-to-date with Google's guidelines and innovations to advise and make decisions that would fit best in an Android application.
cac5b6bc1f05caa67061c64989f324a517735a29.shortBio: Developer since 2004, Benjamin has grown fond of Android since he started tinkering with it in 2011. He was previously employed at Emakina...

b1e2d11f8669d228ed5dd388540aae23c9b81f27.name: Yannick Lemin
b1e2d11f8669d228ed5dd388540aae23c9b81f27.bio: Yannick is a passionate developer and software craftsman. He started in 2000 with C++ cross-platforms applications, continued with Java back-end and web application and stumbled upon Android development in 2009. Android has become a passion and he now tries to touch every aspects of it. He loves to learn new technologies, especially through conferences and meetup events. He also is the co-host of the french speaking Android development podcast Android Leaks, and lead organizer for the GDG Brussels in Belgium.
b1e2d11f8669d228ed5dd388540aae23c9b81f27.shortBio: Yannick is a passionate developer and software craftsman. He started in 2000 with C++ cross-platforms applications, continued with Java back-end...

3e271f509e5ca12cfef7d51e98fde031c124e382.bio:
Android Lead, Founder, Partner at Snapp Mobile
I'm an Android developer, design fanboy and Android GDE. I blog, talk and rave about needs for engineers to appreciate design and preach about way for multi-discipline teams to work together to create great real-world products.

6655ec55dd5d139ccb4d6f8724017c05c51555c3.name: Pierluigi Rufo
6655ec55dd5d139ccb4d6f8724017c05c51555c3.bio: I'm a Product Designer based in Berlin. I like to bring new products to life through a human centered approach and a problem-solving mindset. I've been working for different product companies like Kuponjo and Onefootball. I'm currently tackling new challenges at Snapp Mobile Germany.

786f4ff40c2d8aeef85a8dc997006cae5a4f9dc3.bio: Benoît is an Android developer at Square. He focuses on providing the best Android experience possible, both to customers and fellow developers.

6232967f8d0646a8551e28d2923630d719c4c42f.name: Alex Lockwood
6232967f8d0646a8551e28d2923630d719c4c42f.bio: Alex is an Android designer & developer who helps other designers and developers to understand and create beautiful material design apps. He has been writing about Android since 2012 on his blog, Android Design Patterns. He is also the creator of several popular open source libraries, such as Shape Shifter, Kyrie, and Avocado.
6232967f8d0646a8551e28d2923630d719c4c42f.shortBio: Alex is an Android designer & developer who helps other designers and developers to understand and create beautiful material design apps...

14c3b8582f3c1821ba86739393cd027ec8e321c9.name: Fabien Devos
14c3b8582f3c1821ba86739393cd027ec8e321c9.bio: Fabien Devos has been building mobile apps and games for more than a decade, mainly on Android. In Paris, he worked on some of the top European apps like Dailymotion, Le Monde, or AlloCiné. He then moved to London to join Lightbox which was acquired by Facebook. There, he worked on Facebook’s core Android team. He later joined Wealthfront as their Android Lead, went on to be the Android manager, and was eventually promoted to Director of Mobile. He also created Hacked with Joaquim Vergès, a mobile coding game with close to 1M downloads.
14c3b8582f3c1821ba86739393cd027ec8e321c9.shortBio: Fabien Devos has been building mobile apps and games for more than a decade, mainly on Android. In Paris, he worked on some of the top European...

b90144ca0b7e987da4eac1e6ac116b1f1b2cb6e2.name: David González
b90144ca0b7e987da4eac1e6ac116b1f1b2cb6e2.bio: David is the Lead Android Engineer at Mixtiles, and a Google Developer Expert for Android who has been developing with the Android platform since 2009. He's actively involved in the community, organising the Kotlin User Group in Belgium, and helping the GDG Brussels. Hosts @the_remote_dev podcast, advocating for remote work and its numerous advantages. He is also a Google Startup Launchpad mentor, helping startups and companies produce highly desirable and quality products.

f0b60b05124ad1a0b3e76cca09dd215645931221.name: Rebecca Franks
f0b60b05124ad1a0b3e76cca09dd215645931221.bio: Rebecca is an Android Engineer from South Africa. She is a Google Developer Expert in Android and loves helping other developers learn new things. During the day, she works for a company called Over, where she helps contribute to the graphic design app on a day to day basis. She loves travelling and baking.

7995936e8a151a29c1a6fa72ac7db5ae373b201d.name: Etienne Caron
7995936e8a151a29c1a6fa72ac7db5ae373b201d.bio:
Etienne Caron is a developer lead at Shopify, a popular Canadian e-commerce company. He is also part of Google's Developer Expert program, and an instructor for Caster.io

Etienne has been an active member of the Android developer community in Montreal since 2010, and regularly devotes his time to mentoring startups, developers and students in the mobile space.

3D animation, procedural content generation and VR are some of his hobbies, and he loves introducing other developers to this fascinating field.

109d33decd394492fbd5b99a92dd7607d821d27c.name: Elaine Dias Batista
109d33decd394492fbd5b99a92dd7607d821d27c.bio: Elaine has been working with mobile apps development for the past 6 years. Since the launch of the Google Assistant, she has been following the developments around that area. She truly believes that interacting with technology using natural language will define the future of computing. Born and raised in Brazil, she's been living in France since 2004 and loves everything multicultural. She's a GDE for the Google Assistant.

cb2e16407c778831b4f990bfbd556135c507867f.name: Louis CAD
cb2e16407c778831b4f990bfbd556135c507867f.bio:
Louis CAD prioritizes efficiency over performance. He has been developing Android apps for more than 4 years, using Kotlin since version 1.0.4, and coroutines since version 1.1.

Always trying to innovate, he is interested in a lot of technical subjects of all scales, and how they are linked, directly or not.

He is also a proud bike commuter and a velomobile enthusiast, because it is efficient.
